extendedInfo.description: Have you ever wanted old people to stop with their constant nagging? Tired of the smell of aspirin and Vaporub? Tried of your grandma intervening during "intimate" moments you are having with yourself? Then you need Old Away.Old Away is a tested product that is effective in repelling people ages 58 and above. Old Away works by combining low frequencies that old people can hear. Using the same concept as a sonic mosquito repellent, it is almost guaranteed to make old people turn the other direction when our patented technology is put into effect.Why wait? It's free! Download Old Away today!Disclaimer: We are not responsible for any violent outbursts by targeted old people.

reviews.title: Just Delightful
reviews.comment: Old people annoy me all the time. This app really works!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works perfectly
reviews.comment: Made a pool of seniors and ran various tests using this app...works effectively 100% of the time.
reviews.author: Sean Qureshi

reviews.title: Hate this app
reviews.comment: I\'m 14 and I want to get rid of my dad who is 60 and I\'m wondering why can I hear it? Plus I\'m patty sure it won\'t work!!!
reviews.author: Jesus Caballero

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: This make me laugh so much.
reviews.author: Roy Teple

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: I know there\'s an expression going around these days like \"There\'s an app for everything\" but this is the most stupid I have encountered so far
reviews.author: A Google User
